description: a(1) = 1, a(2) = 2, a(n) = sum of products of previous terms taking n-2 at a time.
comments: The next term (a(11)) has 135 digits.  [From Harvey P. Dale, Feb 29 2012]
author: _Amarnath Murthy_, May 05 2001
extensions: More terms from Asher Auel (asher.auel(AT)reed.edu), May 05 2001. The 11th term has 135 digits.
